attributes.action: Peodophiles should automatically loose any parental responsibility
attributes.additional_details: A parent would find it hard enough to explain all these changes to their child, i find these circumstances extreme and a parent shouldnt have to fight to keep their children safe
attributes.background: There are loads of policies and procedures in place to safeguard and keep children safe, I strongly believe a child should be kept safe. If a parent has to sign a sexual harm register, parental responsibility should automatically be revoked in order to keep the child safe

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577875
